result.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
result.translation: Ni ukuri, Twebwe Allah Twaragerageje Firawuni n’abantu biwe, Turaheza Tubahanisha inzara, amapfa no gukehanirwa n’umwimbu w’ivyamwa n’ibiterwa mbumbarugo, kugira bikebuke, bagaruke ku Mana Allah.
